author: jleroux
msg: While working at layering lookups I found that some of them are inappropriately named lookups and are actually lists (at least for now, locales, timezones and themes)
In this commit I rename them List (instead of Lookup) to avoid future confusion. If this has too much impact we may revert it of course...

author: jleroux
msg: Fix a bug found by chance while working on layering lookups

author: erwan
msg: Reverting rev906020 as it was introducing a dependency with commonext in the framework
